item.title: AWS IoT - Pi in the sky
item.description: Introduction With a high-level plan sketched out and a power detecting Raspberry Pi at my disposal it was time to stay up late and start tapping! As someone who’s trying to reposition themselves as a ‘backend developer’, I knew I wanted to become familiar with Amazon Web Services (AWS). It might not be the answer to every solution, but it certainly felt like something that should be in my toolkit.
